caption: At the marketplace, a woman dressed in splendid attire mingles with the crowd. Among the onlookers, there is a man who appears to be a wizard; he exchanges a few words and then departs. The woman doesn't seem saddened and proceeds to interact with others.In a forest clearing, two women are resting by a white horse, taking a break to drink water. One of the women, a female knight, speaks to the other person, her expression resolute. The other woman agrees with her.Inside a dark castle, a young man and another man are in charge. Someone rushes in, urgently informing them of a dire situation.
